The main markets are the US, Europe and Indonesia. They have 18 well-known local brands, including Giant, Food Lion, Peapod, Albert Heijn, Delhaize and bol.com.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Source:Â \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-italic\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://www.aholddelhaize.com/media/10540/ahold-delhaize-annual-report-2020.pdf\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Ahold Delhaize 2020 annual report\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-italic\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"With 414k employees, they operate 7,137 stores in Europe and the US. They are servicing 54M customers every week, generating EUR 74.7B of revenue in 2020. Around 10% of that is through online sales, a segment that has been rapidly growing over the last years.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Their strategy is around the following main growth drivers:\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Drive omnichannel growth - specifically driving growth through online sales). Examples are bol.com (online platform like Amazon) and the 2020 acquisition of FreshDirect (leading online grocer in the U.S., delivering directly to customers across the New York, Philadelphia and Washington, D.C. metropolitan areas).\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Elevate healthy and sustainable - high margins and addressing changing customer preferences.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Cultivate best talent - despite online sales growth, a lot of their business is around people, and they can (and should) make a difference in productivity and customer satisfaction.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Strengthen Operational Excellence -
